resources.string: Ikona predvajanja/premora je obarvana v primarni barvi
Začenša s sistemom Android 10 , aplikacija nima dostopa do vaših datotek
Are you sure you want to unblock \"%s\"?
Vse naše aplikacije so brez oglasov, Odprta koda in vedno bo tako tudi ostalo. Z vašo pomočjo lahko izvajamo več funkcij in jih še bolje
Prosimo nadgradite Goodwy Thank You na zadnjo verzijo

Seveda! Aplikacijo lahko pokažete prijateljem, nam dateje dobre ocene in povratne informacije. Pomagate lahko tudi tako, da aplikacije prevedete v nov jezik, ali pa posodobite obstoječe prevode. Navodila lahko najdete na https://github.com/Goodwy/Discussion , ali pa nam pošljete sporočilo na goodwy.dev@gmail.com , če potrebujete pomoč.

As your app version is no longer updated, the bugs you have maybe spotted will never be fixed. There will also be no new functions added. You can purchase the Pro version on Google Play for a small sum of money. It is a one time payment, which means that once you purchase it, you will never have to pay again. Not even after getting a new device. If you won\'t like the Pro version, you can just uninstall it within a few hours and you will automatically get your money back. If you want a refund anytime later, just contact us at goodwy.dev@gmail.com and you will get it.

This list contains everyone that noticeably helped any app within the Goodwy suite, not only this one. Translations are handled by volunteers, let us know if you want to help too. The guide to translating is at this website, or just contact us at goodwy.dev@gmail.com if you have any questions. Thanks to all contributors and other supporters!
ZASTARELO: Ta verzija aplikacije se ne vzdržuje več, pridobite si Pro verzijo na https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.goodwy.xxx.pro

Ne pozabite - če odstranite katerokoli plačljivo aplikacijo v dveh urah, dobite povrnjen avtomatično denar. Če želite povrnitev denarja po preteku tega časa, nas kontaktirajte na goodwy.dev@gmail.com in poskrbeli bomo za to. Zaradi tega je preizkušanje aplikacije še bolj preprosto. :)

Hey,

if you like this application, then we recommend you to install our application to view and edit contacts.

Thanks
